info.title: OpenAuth Simulator CLI
info.summary: Authentication simulator CLI (HOTP, TOTP, OCRA, FIDO2/WebAuthn, EMV/CAP, EUDIW)
info.description: Command-line interface for the OpenAuth Simulator. Commands cover evaluate/replay/seed flows and, when --output-json is set, emit a single JSON telemetry object instead of text output.

examples: java -jar openauth-sim-standalone-<version>.jar ocra verify --suite OCRA-1:HOTP-SHA1-6:QN08 --credential-id inline-ocra --otp 123456 --output-json
java -jar openauth-sim-standalone-<version>.jar emv cap evaluate --mode RESPOND --credential-id emv-demo --output-json
java -jar openauth-sim-standalone-<version>.jar eudiw request create --profile HAIP --output-json

value.name: openauth-sim
value.description: Multi-protocol authentication simulator CLI (HOTP, TOTP, OCRA, FIDO2/WebAuthn, EMV/CAP, EUDIW/OpenID4VP)

commands.name: hotp
commands.description: Manage HOTP credentials and evaluate responses.

commands.name: evaluate
commands.description: Validate HOTP responses for stored or inline credentials.

flags.description: Normalized HOTP CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name (for example, "--credential-id").

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for HOTP evaluate).

examples.description: Stored HOTP evaluation with JSON output

commands.name: list
commands.description: List HOTP credentials.

flags.description: Normalized HOTP CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name (for example, "--database", "--output-json").

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for HOTP list).

commands.name: totp
commands.description: Manage TOTP credentials and evaluate time-based OTPs.

commands.name: evaluate
commands.description: Evaluate TOTP codes for stored or inline credentials.

flags.description: Normalized TOTP CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name (for example, "--credential-id").

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for TOTP evaluate).

examples.description: Stored TOTP evaluation with JSON output

commands.name: list
commands.description: List TOTP credentials.

flags.description: Normalized TOTP CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name (for example, "--database", "--output-json").

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for TOTP list).

commands.name: ocra
commands.description: Manage OCRA credentials and verify challengeâ€“response OTPs.
examples: java -jar openauth-sim-standalone-<version>.jar ocra verify --suite OCRA-1:HOTP-SHA1-6:QN08 --credential-id inline-ocra --otp 123456 --output-json

commands.name: import
commands.description: Persist an OCRA credential descriptor into the store.
examples: java -jar openauth-sim-standalone-<version>.jar ocra import --credential-id account-1 --suite OCRA-1:HOTP-SHA1-6:QA08 --secret 31323334 --output-json

flags.description: Normalized OCRA import CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name (for example, "--credential-id", "--suite").

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for OCRA import).

examples.cli: java -jar openauth-sim-standalone-<version>.jar ocra import --credential-id account-1 --suite OCRA-1:HOTP-SHA1-6:QA08 --secret 31323334 --output-json

commands.name: list
commands.description: List stored OCRA credentials.

flags.description: Normalized OCRA list CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name (for example, "--database", "--output-json").

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for OCRA list).

commands.name: delete
commands.description: Delete a stored OCRA credential.

flags.description: Normalized OCRA delete CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name (for example, "--credential-id").

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for OCRA delete).

commands.name: verify
commands.description: Verify a supplied OTP using OCRA.
examples: java -jar openauth-sim-standalone-<version>.jar ocra verify --suite OCRA-1:HOTP-SHA1-6:QN08 --credential-id inline-ocra --otp 123456 --output-json

flags.description: Normalized OCRA CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name (for example, "--suite", "--otp").

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for OCRA verify).

examples.description: Inline OCRA verification with JSON output
examples.cli: java -jar openauth-sim-standalone-<version>.jar ocra verify --suite OCRA-1:HOTP-SHA1-6:QN08 --credential-id inline-ocra --otp 123456 --output-json

commands.name: emv
commands.description: Evaluate EMV/CAP flows.
examples: java -jar openauth-sim-standalone-<version>.jar emv cap evaluate --mode RESPOND --credential-id emv-demo --output-json

commands.name: cap
commands.description: Derive EMV/CAP OTP values for Identify, Respond, and Sign modes.

commands.name: evaluate
commands.description: Derive an EMV/CAP OTP for the supplied parameters.
examples: java -jar openauth-sim-standalone-<version>.jar emv cap evaluate --mode RESPOND --credential-id emv-demo --output-json

flags.description: Normalized EMV/CAP evaluate CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name (for example, "--mode", "--credential-id").

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for EMV/CAP evaluate).

examples.cli: java -jar openauth-sim-standalone-<version>.jar emv cap evaluate --mode RESPOND --credential-id emv-demo --output-json

commands.name: replay
commands.description: Replay EMV/CAP transactions against stored or inline descriptors.
examples: java -jar openauth-sim-standalone-<version>.jar emv cap replay --mode RESPOND --credential-id emv-demo --output-json

flags.description: Normalized EMV/CAP replay CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name (for example, "--mode", "--credential-id").

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for EMV/CAP replay).

examples.cli: java -jar openauth-sim-standalone-<version>.jar emv cap replay --mode RESPOND --credential-id emv-demo --output-json

commands.name: fido2
commands.description: Evaluate WebAuthn assertions, verify attestation payloads, and replay diagnostics.

commands.name: evaluate
commands.description: Evaluate stored or inline WebAuthn assertions.

flags.description: Normalized FIDO2 CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name (for example, "--preset-id").

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for fido2 evaluate).

commands.name: replay
commands.description: Replay stored WebAuthn assertions against expected verifiers.

flags.description: Normalized FIDO2 CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name (for example, "--credential-id").

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for fido2 replay).

commands.name: attest
commands.description: Generate WebAuthn attestation objects.

flags.description: Normalized FIDO2 attestation CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name (for example, "--preset-id").

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for fido2 attest).

commands.name: attest-replay
commands.description: Replay WebAuthn attestation objects against trust anchors.

flags.description: Normalized FIDO2 attestation replay CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name (for example, "--preset-id").

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for fido2 attest-replay).

examples.description: Replay WebAuthn attestation against preset trust anchors

commands.name: seed-attestations
commands.description: Seed WebAuthn attestation credentials into the store.

flags.description: Normalized FIDO2 seed-attestations CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name.

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for fido2 seed-attestations).

commands.name: vectors
commands.description: List available WebAuthn JSON bundle sample vectors.

flags.description: Normalized FIDO2 vectors CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name.

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for fido2 vectors).

commands.name: eudiw
commands.description: EUDIW OpenID4VP simulator flows.
examples: java -jar openauth-sim-standalone-<version>.jar eudiw request create --profile HAIP --output-json

commands.name: request
commands.description: Create EUDIW authorization requests.

commands.name: create
commands.description: Create a HAIP-aligned authorization request.
examples: java -jar openauth-sim-standalone-<version>.jar eudiw request create --profile HAIP --output-json

flags.description: Normalized EUDIW request CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name (for example, "--profile", "--response-mode").

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for eudiw request create).

examples.cli: java -jar openauth-sim-standalone-<version>.jar eudiw request create --profile HAIP --output-json

commands.name: wallet
commands.description: Simulate wallet responses.

commands.name: simulate
commands.description: Generate deterministic wallet responses for a request.
examples: java -jar openauth-sim-standalone-<version>.jar eudiw wallet simulate --request-id HAIP-0001 --output-json

flags.description: Normalized EUDIW wallet simulate CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name (for example, "--request-id").

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for eudiw wallet simulate).

examples.description: Simulate a wallet response for HAIP-0001
examples.cli: java -jar openauth-sim-standalone-<version>.jar eudiw wallet simulate --request-id HAIP-0001 --output-json

commands.name: validate
commands.description: Validate VP Tokens against Trusted Authorities.

flags.description: Normalized EUDIW validate CLI flags for this invocation, keyed by long option name (for example, "--request-id").

positionals.description: Raw positional arguments (unused for eudiw validate).
